docs.snippet: The Tigers’ Max Scherzer, who went 21-3 with 2.90 earned run average and 240 strikeouts, won the A.L. Cy Young Award despite not ever having pitched a complete game in his career....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tigers’ Max Scherzer, who went 21-3 with 2.90 earned run average and 240 strikeouts, won the A.L. Cy Young Award despite not ever having pitched a complete game in his career.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Detroit Tigers' Max Scherzer has become the first pitcher in history to win the American League Cy Young Award without having pitched a complete game in his career; notes that Scherzer had 21 victories, a 2.90 earned run average and 240 strikeouts.

headline.main: No Complete Games but a Cy Young Award
headline.print_headline: No Complete Games But a Cy Young Award

docs.snippet: Infielder Nick Punto agreed to a one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Infielder Nick Punto agreed to a one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers.
docs.abstract: Infielder Nick Punto agrees to one-year, $3 million contract with the Oakland Athletics after a little more than a season with the Los Angeles Dodgers; other baseball news noted.

docs.snippet: The agent Scott Boras, whose clients include Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, has made a point in recent years to tweak the Mets, and did so again Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The agent Scott Boras, whose clients include Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, has made a point in recent years to tweak the Mets, and did so again Wednesday.
docs.abstract: Scott Boras, agent for some of baseball's stars, gives his annual, unofficial address at baseball's general manager's meeting, making number of quips at the expense of the New York Mets; discusses free agent clients Jacoby Ellsbury, Shin-Soo Choo and Stephen Drew, all possible fits for the New York Yankees or Mets.

headline.main: Boras Has a Few Zingers, and a Few Free-Agent Stars, for the Mets
headline.print_headline: Boras Has a Few Zingers, and a Few Free-Agent Stars, for the Mets

docs.snippet: At the sentencing hearing for James (Whitey) Bulger, grieving widows and fatherless children stepped forward, many to curse the man who had robbed them of their loved ones....
docs.lead_paragraph: At the sentencing hearing for James (Whitey) Bulger, grieving widows and fatherless children stepped forward, many to curse the man who had robbed them of their loved ones.
docs.abstract: Relatives of victims of Boston crime boss James (Whitey) Bulger step forward at his sentencing hearing, many to curse the man who had robbed them of their loved ones.

headline.main: Tables Turned, Victims’ Relatives Get Their Chance at Bulger
headline.print_headline: Tables Turned, Victims’ Relatives Get Their Chance at Bulger

docs.snippet: Sachin Tendulkar will play his final test for India starting Thursday, exiting as a player who carried the expectations of a nation for more than two decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar will play his final test for India starting Thursday, exiting as a player who carried the expectations of a nation for more than two decades.
docs.abstract: Beloved cricket star Sachin Tendulkar will play his final test for India, exiting game as player who carried the expectation of a nation for more than two decades; outpouring of tribute across country testifies to Tendulkar's unmatched standing as both a sports and cultural hero.

headline.main: Final Innings for a Cricket Giant
headline.print_headline: Final Innings for a Cricket Giant
